name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Barry MOURAR, Appellant
docket_number: Appeals Nos. 115 and 116 E.D. Appeal Dkt. 1986

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Barry MOURAR, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order of Superior Court vacated and matter remanded to that court for further proceedings in light of Commonwealth v. Sessoms, 516 Pa. 365, 532 A.2d 775 (1987).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: William J. Honig, Norristown, for appellant.
James P. MacElree, II, Dist. Atty., Stuart Suss, Director of Appeals, West Chester, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
534 A.2d 1050
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Barry MOURAR, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 10, 1987.
Decided Dec. 4, 1987.
William J. Honig, Norristown, for appellant.
James P. MacElree, II, Dist. Atty., Stuart Suss, Director of Appeals, West Chester, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
